items.headline: Trump has delayed higher tariffs on cabinets and furniture until 2027. These stocks are getting a lift.
items.summary_en: A troubled U.S. housing market, coupled with fear of tariff costs passed on to inflation-weary consumers, weighed on home-furnishing stocks in 2025.

items.headline: Shannen Doherty’s estate claims ex-husband has refused to list $1.5 million Texas home
items.summary_en: Shannen Doherty’s estate has claimed that her ex-husband Kurt Iswarienko owes money after refusing to list their $1.5 million Texas home, despite the terms outlined in their divorce agreement.
